summary.content: If you’re having a hard time getting to the Mozilla FTP or websites to download Firefox 1.0, you can get builds from me. Windows Installer Mac OS X Disk Image Linux Installer

content.html:
If you’re having a hard time getting to the Mozilla FTP or websites to download Firefox 1.0, you can get builds from me.

If you’re having a hard time getting to the Mozilla FTP or websites to download Firefox 1.0, you can get builds from me.
 Windows Installer Mac OS X Disk Image Linux Installer
content.source:
If you’re having a hard time getting to the Mozilla FTP or websites to download Firefox 1.0, you can get builds from me.

* [Windows Installer]({{% wayback "http://downloads.skyzyx.net/firefox/Firefox%20Setup%201.0.exe" %}})
* [Mac OS X Disk Image]({{% wayback "http://downloads.skyzyx.net/firefox/Firefox%201.0.dmg.gz" %}})
* [Linux Installer]({{% wayback "http://downloads.skyzyx.net/firefox/firefox-1.0.installer.tar.gz" %}})
